data.name: mandyoc
data.description: MANDYOC is a finite element code written on top of the PETSc library  to simulate thermo-chemical convection of the Earth's mantle

evidence: “Mandyoc is a finite element code written on top of the PETSc library to simulate thermo-chemical convection of the Earth's mantle.”
Documentation page describes “how the code works, how it was implemented, how to install it, the description of the parameters and input files, some applications and some useful examples.”
“Most discussion happens on Github… Feel free to open an issue… or comment on any open issue or pull request.” (indicating primary distribution and use via the GitHub repository).
